item.title: Trump-backed Republican Matt Van Epps wins US House special election in Tennessee
item.description: Republican Matt Van Epps has won a special election in Tennessee for a seat in the U.S. House

item.title: Federal border agents launch immigration crackdown in New Orleans
item.description: The Department of Homeland Security has launched an immigration crackdown in New Orleans, saying the operation targets violent criminals

item.title: Officials search for Georgia inmate who escaped from a hospital
item.description: Officials say they are searching for a Georgia inmate who escaped from a hospital and is considered armed and dangerous

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Tuesday’s Mega Millions
item.description: The winning numbers in Tuesday evening’s drawing of the "Mega Millions" game were: 17-25-26-53-60, Mega Ball: 16, Megaplier:
